title: beautifully single's family home
posting_body: ["A beautifully single's family home; minutes to Downtown Hollywood, Shopping Centers, TY Park, Hollywood Memorial Hospital, Hard Rock Casino and Restaurants.", 'Available for immediate move in!', '3 bedrooms, 2 full baths; with large family room (15 Feet X 30 Feet); laundry room; New Roof, New updated kitchen, Hurricane Shutters on every window and tile flooring throughout.', 'Central A/C. Fully fenced large backyard.', 'One of a kind in this quiet desired Hollywood Hills...', 'Lawn maintenance paid by landlord! covered carport + storage area...Must see!', '1807 N 40th Ave HOLLYWOOD, FL 33021-4849', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTF10323814', 'Type of Property: SINGLE', 'List Price:\t$4,000', 'Bedrooms:  3', 'Bathrooms: 2', 'SqFt (Liv):1,832', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:Minyan Realty LLC']
